name: Crushing Dread
description:
Note: Sorry the game is download-only, I wanted to have a web version but love.js was giving me issues

You are Dread the robot, and you're trapped in a trash compactor. Use the various junk you find to make gadgets to try and hold back your impending doom. How long can you last?

Music once again created by LCS - Check out her other work here!

Created for Ludum Dare 50 - Delay the Inevitable

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Interact

q/w/e - Place Structures
